text: The USS Lewis B. Puller (ESB-3) is the first purpose-built expeditionary mobile base vessel in the United States Navy. ==History== U.S. Navy SEALs launched from the Lewis B. Puller for the 2024 Iranian dhow seizure operation in January 2024. ==References== Category:Naval ships of the United States
title: USS Lewis B. Puller (ESB-3)
